role.argrole: agent, entity making something be longer

example.parse: (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نمد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ايدي) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نتعاون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP في) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (PRON_1P نا))))))))))))

(S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS سأل) (NP-SBJ-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM البطريرك) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الماروني)) (NP (DET+NOUN الكاردينال) (NOUN_PROP مار) (NOUN_PROP نصرالله) (NOUN_PROP بطرس) (NOUN_PROP صفير))) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC السيد) (DET+NOUN_PROP المسيح)) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN ذكرى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ارتفاع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصليب))))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يمد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجرأة))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حمل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الصليب))) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الايام)))
